title: Reuters reveals Power grids in five emerging countries to get investment support
dc:creator: Jaime-Lee Charles
description:
Reuters revealed that Ukraine, Fiji, Colombia, Kenya and Mali will be the first countries to participate in an investment program announced on […]

The post Reuters reveals Power grids in five emerging countries to get investment support appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters revealed that Ukraine, Fiji, Colombia, Kenya and Mali will be the first countries to participate in an investment program announced on Nov. 4 that will help developing countries transform their power grids to carry growing levels of renewable energy. The Climate Investment Funds, created by the world’s biggest economies in 2008 to help developing countries accelerate their shift to a low-carbon economy, said its new initiative would help those countries bridge a huge gap in investments needed to integrate renewable energy sources.

The post Reuters reveals Power grids in five emerging countries to get investment support appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
